rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A spacious entrance area with direct access to the courtyard. Adheres to Vastu guidelines by facing North, promoting positive energy.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Central open space with large windows for natural light and views of the courtyard. Positioned in the South-West quadrant to balance energy flow.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room. Placed in the North-East region to enhance digestion and social interaction as per Vastu.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Functional kitchen with ample space for cooking utilities, aligned eastward following Vastu guidelines. Features reinforced concrete finishes in Brutalist style.

openings.description: A robust door design with heavy concrete framing and glass accents. Ensures structural integrity in the Brutalist style.
Large window openings to maximize natural light and provide visual connection with the courtyard. Designed for energy efficiency.

notes.duplex_info: Second floor includes additional bedrooms and private spaces.
notes.style: Brutalist architecture with emphasis on raw concrete elements and geometric forms. Adheres to Vastu principles where possible.
